context: the patient was taken to the operating room and prepped and draped in the usual fashion after induction of general endotracheal anesthesia.
the mcivor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and the tongue depressor applied.
two #12-french red rubber robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage
the nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% neo-synephrine and tannic acid powder.
the nasopharynx was packed with 2 cherry gauze sponges coated in a solution of 0.25% neo-synephrine and tannic acid powder.
the bleeding was controlled with the suction bovie unit.
the patient tolerated the procedure well and left the operating room in good condition.
